statements: DELETE FROM social_media_campaigns_impact WHERE brand_awareness_rating < 4.5 AND reputation_rating < 3.0;
DELETE FROM social_media_campaigns_impact WHERE mentions_count > 1000 OR shares_count > 500;
DELETE FROM social_media_campaigns WHERE campaign_name = 'Summer Sale Campaign';
DELETE FROM social_media_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 101 AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM campaign_metrics WHERE campaign_id IN (SELECT campaign_id FROM social_media_campaigns WHERE budget < 5000) AND mentions > 1000;
DELETE FROM BrandAwareness WHERE campaign_id IN (SELECT campaign_id FROM Campaigns WHERE end_date < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM Reputation WHERE brand_id = 5 AND reputation_score < 50;
DELETE FROM BrandMetrics WHERE campaign_id = 8 AND metric_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM shares WHERE user_id = 5 AND share_platform = 'Twitter';
